title: LiquidPhase_WMRS

liquid_type.title: liquid_type
liquid_type.description: Information about the type of liquid used, whether it is an organic solvent,an aqueous buffer or are mixture of both.

liquid_amount.title: liquid_amount
liquid_amount.description: Amount of the liquid added to the reaction.

liquid_unit.title: liquid_unit
liquid_unit.description: In case of aqueous liquids, mL (milliliter) is often used as unit, in case of organic solvents, volume percentage (Vol %) or volume fraction (Vol/Vol) is utilized.

description: If more then one liquid phase exists the metadata has to be recorded according to the number of liquid phases.Solid phase
